alerts.title: Dockerfile: Image user should not be 'root'
alerts.description: Specify at least 1 USER command in Dockerfile with non-root user as argument

props.resolution: Add 'USER <non root user name>' line to the Dockerfile

detailedReport.content:
## Dockerfile Configuration Issue: DS-0002

### Description
Specify at least 1 USER command in Dockerfile with non-root user as argument

### File Location
- **Dockerfile**: `Dockerfile`
- **Rule ID**: DS-0002

### Issue Details
Specify at least 1 USER command in Dockerfile with non-root user as argument

### Resolution
Add 'USER <non root user name>' line to the Dockerfile

### Security Impact
Dockerfile misconfigurations can lead to:
- Privilege escalation vulnerabilities
- Information disclosure
- Increased attack surface
- Compliance violations

alerts.title: Dockerfile: No HEALTHCHECK defined
alerts.description: Add HEALTHCHECK instruction in your Dockerfile

detailedReport.content:
## Dockerfile Configuration Issue: DS-0026

### Description
Add HEALTHCHECK instruction in your Dockerfile

### File Location
- **Dockerfile**: `Dockerfile`
- **Rule ID**: DS-0026

### Issue Details
Add HEALTHCHECK instruction in your Dockerfile

### Resolution
Add HEALTHCHECK instruction in Dockerfile

### Security Impact
Dockerfile misconfigurations can lead to:
- Privilege escalation vulnerabilities
- Information disclosure
- Increased attack surface
- Compliance violations
